ygData.subject: Re: Magic Arrows and Bows
ygData.msgSnippet: Put all the items in the bag hit combine and give to Maestryn. I dont know where you heard hitting combine would ruin it all. If you dont hit combine he just
ygData.messageBody:
Put all the items in the bag hit combine and give to Maestryn. I dont know
where you heard hitting combine would ruin it all. If you dont hit combine
he just merrily takes your hard earned items and says thank you sending you
on your way.
-----Original Message-----
From: Daz Allan <darrena@...>
To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 19, 1999 9:08 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] Magic Arrows and Bows


>From: "Daz Allan" <darrena@...>
>
>Im about to do the Trueshot Quest, and just wondered how I give the stuff
to
>Maestryn.... i.e He gives you a bag when u start the quest, do you put the
>items in here and then give that to him, or do you just give all four to
him
>seperately not in the bag (the bag even has a combine button but Ive been
>told not to use this because it will waste them, or is the bag for actually
>making the bow?). Just dont want to mess it up having gone to all the darn
>trouble of getting the stuff together :)))
>
>Dagorn of Eci.
>
>
>
>
>>From: "Ben Sarsgard (3)" <bens@...>
>>
>>*SPOILER (sort of)*
>>
>>Maesyn Trueshot sends you on a quest to get 4 materials to bring back to
>him, and he gives you the Trueshot STAFF, which you must cobine with more
>items to make the BOW. I'll spare the details since it's on most spoiler
>sites.
>>
>>Slig of Povar
>>
>>>>> "kale usi" <kaleusi@...> 07/19 11:09 AM >>>
>>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>>From: "Michael Buck" <lugh@...>
>>>
>>> If you thought about it there really is no point to a magical bow.
>The
>>>arrow is the thing that actually hits the monster. Now if the bow was a
>>>magic bow and it did something such as make it so you never missed your
>>>target then that would be a very usful magic bow but other than that I
>dont
>>>beleive that just a plain magic bow has any use, the arrow is the thing
>>>that needs to be magic.
>>>
>>> And to answer your second question no I cant make a Trueshot
>>Longbow,
>>>but I have seen one person selling them on my server. He >said you do
have
>>>to be a very high level fletcher to make one though. >I will see if I can
>>>find him again.
>>>
>>>Another thought I had was what if we could have our arrows do >something
>>>useful other than just pull monsters. What if we could make >an arrow
that
>>>also poisoned the monster, diseased it, or something to >that effect. I
>>>think thats something we should all look into.
>>>
>>>Amrosse
>>>Rallos Zek
>>>
>>
>>I'm probably wrong - but I thought you got the Trueshot Longbow from a
>>quest? Or do you just get the components to make one from the quest?
>>
>>
